Can I use the `getnettotals` command to get information about the total amount of Verus coins transferred on the network?

No, the `getnettotals` command does not provide information about the total amount of Verus coins transferred on the network. It only provides information about network traffic, including bytes received and sent, and CPU time.

getnettotals

Returns information about network traffic, including bytes in, bytes out,
and current time.

Result:
{
 "totalbytesrecv": n,  (numeric) Total bytes received
 "totalbytessent": n,  (numeric) Total bytes sent
 "timemillis": t    (numeric) Total cpu time
}

Examples:
> verus getnettotals 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getnettotals", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
